meratata rediyo yantha්ra handunwa dun 1930 gananwala eewa pupura yannata, gini gannata haki bhayanaka petti yayi athamun ki bawa ma kuda kalaye aachchi aawarjanaya kala. 1960-70 dashakawala chitha්rakatha madhyaya apekaranaya weddi eyata nagu awalada ha chodana gana mita ihatha kolamakin apa katha kala.

nopolawa- depa sahitha wu saththwayek ma nopolawa, satharapada aththa wu sathwayek ho boho pa aththawuda sathwayo ma no polawa siyalu sathwahuda, siyalu pranihuda siyalu bhuthayo da yana me siyallo yahapath karanayan dakithwa, ee kisi pudgalayekuta dukak karadarayak no paminewa, budu gunaya klesadiya nathi bawin pamana naththe ya.

ebawin owun dedena sambandha siddhin wiwechanaya kirima paseka thaba guru wruththiya mebadu pirihunu thathwayakata path kale kawurunda, kumak sandahada, eya walakwa ganimata kala yuthu, kala haki yamak thawa ithiriwa thibeda yanna pilibandawa samajiya kathikawak, sanwadayak athi kirima thawath ' kalyani la ' siya gananak idiriyedi nirmanaya wima walakwa ganimata gathahaki hondama kriyamargayayi.
